game.name: Collector's Edition
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 카메라 움직임 조정, 색상 대체, 음량 개별 조정, 난이도 조정, 마우스 전용 옵션, 퀵타임 이벤트 없이 플레이 가능, 수시 저장, 컨트롤러 일부 지원, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Hunt treasures at garage sales, inspect every flaw, and haggle with eccentric sellers. Photograph your finds, choose the right headline and list them online to flip for a profit. Keep the best for your private collection. It's the Collect Everything Game!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Hunt treasures at garage sales, inspect every flaw, and haggle with eccentric sellers. Photograph your finds, choose the right headline and list them online to flip for a profit. Keep the best for your private collection. It's the Collect Everything Game!
